Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with worn bands in added red and white; exterior: painted decoration consisting of sphinx seated to left (part of hair, wing with red patch, foreleg and body with three red dots remaining).
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 289, no. 865, pl. 119)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1112) (phase 2)
